children.name: The Mission
children.description: To ensure music creators are respected, recognized, and fairly compensated.

children.name: The Philosophy
children.description: "Music has value."

children.name: Key Phrase
children.description: "I am passionate about ensuring that creators and publishers get paid fairly for their work so they can focus on their art."

children.name: Member-Centricity
children.description: SOCAN is member-owned and not-for-profit. Everything is about the 180,000+ songwriters and publishers.

children.name: ACD & CRM
children.description: Mention your comfort with data management and high-volume digital environments.

children.name: Self-Service
children.description: Mention that you understand the value of empowering members through self-service tools on the SOCAN website.

children.name: Efficiency
children.description: "With my background in software development, I have a natural eye for process efficiency and data accuracy, which I know is vital for royalty tracking."

children.name: On Customer Service
children.description: "I aim to be the primary, reliable point of contact, ensuring every member feels heard and supported."

children.name: On Problem Solving
children.description: "I enjoy digging into complex queries—like underpayment issues or work registration—to find a precise resolution."

children.name: On the Music Industry
children.description: "I understand that the industry is changing rapidly (with AI and streaming), and I want to help SOCAN navigate that by protecting our members' rights."

children.name: The Developer Edge
children.description: Briefly mention how your coding background helps you troubleshoot technical hurdles or learn new CRM platforms faster than the average candidate.

children.name: The Conflict Resolver
children.description: Have a story ready about a time you turned a frustrated client (or user) into a satisfied one.

children.name: The Multi-tasker
children.description: A story about managing a high-volume workload (e.g., managing multiple dev tickets or customer calls) while maintaining high quality.

children.name: Data Verification
children.description: Verification of data received for completeness and accuracy.

children.name: Repertoire Research
children.description: Research member repertoire for songs/cues on SOCAN’s internal databases.

children.name: Unmatched Linking
children.description: Identify and link unmatched usage/performances to songs/cues registered in SOCAN’s internal databases.

children.name: Payment Accuracy
children.description: Review and verification of matched usage/performances for accuracy of payment and make necessary corrections of any incorrect matched usage.

children.name: Match Improvement
children.description: Review and make necessary corrections of matched usage with pending status to help improve learned match and accuracy of payment for future distributions.

children.name: Query Resolution
children.description: Liaising with Queries team, as required, to resolve complex queries from members and/or foreign societies.

children.name: Process Improvement
children.description: Proactively advise Team Lead of any potential efficiency and process improvements.

children.name: Other Duties
children.description: Other duties, as required.

children.name: Education
children.description: High School Diploma/equivalent or work-related experience.

children.name: Industry Knowledge
children.description: Knowledge or experience in the Music Industry or Performing Rights is an asset.

children.name: Copyright Knowledge
children.description: Knowledge of copyright or writer/publisher song splits.

children.name: Computer Literacy
children.description: Working knowledge of Microsoft Office Suite, Excel/Word.

children.name: Skills
children.description: Excellent organizational and research skills.

children.name: Languages
children.description: Fluent in both English and French an asset.

children.name: Problem Solving
children.description: Problem solving and decision making.

children.name: Teamwork
children.description: Ability to work as part of a team and contribute to creating a strong team dynamic.

children.name: Independence
children.description: Ability to work independently and set priorities to meet deadlines.

children.name: Accuracy
children.description: Accuracy and detail oriented.

children.name: Analytical
children.description: Analytical.

children.name: Results
children.description: Results oriented.

children.name: Thoroughness
children.description: Thorough.

children.name: Efficiency
children.description: Efficient.

children.name: Proactive
children.description: Proactive.

children.name: Adaptability
children.description: Adaptability and flexibility.

children.name: Question 1
children.description: "How does the team balance the high volume of calls with the need for deep, technical research on member accounts?"

children.name: Question 2
children.description: "What does 'success' look like for a Member Service Agent in the first 90 days?"

children.name: Question 3
children.description: "How is SOCAN currently supporting members in navigating the impact of AI on their royalties?"
